verbs.description: [V: s] korea refuses refugee status for nearly 400 yemenis nearly 400 yemenis were denied refugee status by south korea on wednesday months after their arrival on the resort island of jeju triggered a populist outcry jeju korea refugee official southeast asia yemenis s korea jeju city china s korea south korea southern island
